case.state: Tracks if the player is wearing Mari's panties.
Adjusts Mari's difficulty to "Average" if Mari's in the lead.
Adjusts Mari's difficulty to "Good" if she and her only opponent are tied, or if her opponent only has a slight (1-layer) lead.
Adjusts Mari's difficulty to "Best" if her only opponent has a a significant (more than 1 layer) lead.
Sets Mari's difficulty to "Good", if she's going head-to-head with an opponent who is losing or only has a slight lead.
Sets Mari's difficulty to "Best" if she's going head-to-head with a single opponent at low layers.
Sets Mari's difficulty to "Best", if she's going head to head with an opponent who has a significant lead.
Resets Mari's difficulty to what it should be for her stage, if she's not trailing that far behind the best-performing player.
Sets Mari's difficulty to Good, if she's trailing behind by two layers (compared to the best-performing player).
Sets Mari's difficulty to Best, if she's trailing behind the best-performing player by a lot.
Resets Mari's difficulty, if she's not trailing behind the best-performing player significantly.
